name: Brave Modern Times
description:
In the future year 2080 Technology is hated by many people.  You work at Solace Cloning Lab in New York City. You live your day to day life drunk or on drugs to numb the pain of your girlfriend leafing you.

One day your co-worker and friend shows you something that he's been working one for a while and it impacts both of your lives. 

-- BraveModernTImes is still in development this Visual Novel is 5 chapters but only 2 are playable I encourage anyone to help with the development of the game by playing it and giving feedback. I really appreciate the feedback.  --
